title: Alcoforado
body: It is an ancient and noble surname, but long extinct in Madeira. The first to use it here was Gonçalo Pinto Alcoforado, who came to this island around the year 1500 and established residence in Machico, where he died, having instituted an entailed estate there.

Gonçalo Pinto Alcoforado: Used the surname Alcoforado, established residence in Machico, instituted an entailed estate

1500: Gonçalo Pinto Alcoforado came to the island and established residence in Machico
